name: One can Move, one can Jump
name_original: One can Move, one can Jump
description:
In this Prototype two people controll one character (the blue cube) and try to get to the end of the level. When you hit a red cube the level restarts.

You can only play this game if you have 2 Controller.

The Controls are really simple. One person can move the character with the joystick and the other person can with a second controller jump when pressing a.

After you finished the 8th level you completed the game. It´s no bug that you can´t get in the next level !
